title: Lesson 1 Quiz
description: This is the quiz that focuses on data types

questions.question: Oh no! You've stumbled upon 4 seashells! What kind of data type is "4"?

questions.question2: Oops! You've come across 4 more seashells! What kind of data type can you make with 4 sea shells?

questions.question3: You ran into a statue of Pelé! What kind of data type is "Pelé"?

questions.question4: Oh no you ran into a statue of __! What kind of data type would you use to say that it is true that you ran into a statue?

questions.question5: Oops! You ran into a collection of Palm Trees! What do we call a different type of something in computer science?
